title: Forms and Autofill stopped working
content:
I know that the autofill for credit cards is only available in the US and Canada (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/credit-card-autofill#w_edit-your-saved-credit-cards). I live in the US. The feature was working just fine... until I traveled overseas and used my laptop there and changed time zones to where I was visiting. Now that I'm back in the US, the feature is missing. In the settings, I don't see a "Forms and Autofill" section in the settings. I checked system locale and it's properly set to us-en. All the settings are properly set in about:config. I've tried everything I found by searching online and nothing helped. I even tried creating a separate profile in Firefox to see if the section shows up under setting with no luck.

Any help/suggestions would be greatly appreciated.
creator: sarilouis

title: Connexion non sécurisée
content: Can you fix the CONNECTION NOT SECURE warnings, otherwise I'm switching to Chrome!
creator: mjoly2020

title: Sidebar missing after update
content:
After updating my laptop, the sidebar is missing, and after looking quite a bit, I see no way to restore it. There is no Sidebar icon in the upper right anymore.

I'm typing this from my main computer which hasn't been updated.
creator: Gonga
